title: Appreciating Every Area of Our Life | Victoria Osteen
itunes:title: Appreciating Every Area of Our Life | Victoria Osteen
description:
Wherever you are today, ask God to show you the blessings in your life. When you learn to value what you have, you'll be prepared to receive all of His promises. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
